title: All-Party Parliamentary Group for Funerals and Bereavement
purpose: To raise awareness and discuss policy issues affecting the funerals sector and the bereaved.

contact_details.registered_contact_address: House of Commons, London, SW1A 0AA. Tel: 020 7219 6001.
contact_details.secretariat: GK Strategy acts as the group's secretariat.https://gkstrategy.com/

detailed_benefits.Description: GK Strategy is paid by the following to act as the group's secretariat: National Association of Funeral Directors, Society of Allied and Independent Funeral Directors, The Cremation Society, The Federation of Burial and Cremation Authorities, The Institute of Cemetery and Crematorium Management, The Funeral Suppliers Association, The Association of Private Crematoria and Cemeteries From : 04/11/2024 To  : 03/11/2025
